alert.note: Alert for Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:28PM EDT until June 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lawrence County in northeastern Kentucky... Central Wayne County in western West Virginia... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 128 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yatesville Lake State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Louisa, Yatesville Lake State Park, Fort Gay, Dunlow, East Lynn Lake, Gallup, Fallsburg, East Lynn, Genoa, Clifford and Glenhayes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
